inclusion.criterion: women with clinically node negative invasive or microinvasive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: neoadjuvant breast cancer treatment based on surgeon's discretion (ASCO)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive and ER/PR negative invasive ductal carcinoma, clear surgical margins, and 1 positive lymph node out of 12 sampled.
